title: New masteries help pls <3
body: I want to play alistar but I have no idea wich new masteries to use :s pls help me *-* :D <3

replies.body:
I've got my masteries for Tanky supps like this:
Cunning:
Wanderer->Secrect Stash ->Meditation->Bandit
Resolve:
Unyielding->Tough Skin->Veteran's Scars->Insight->Legendary Guardian->Bond of Stone

But i'm still experimenting
thank you vermy much ill try these :) text me back if you have more experiences
